title: The Silver Chair
subject_group: Literature/Fantastic fiction - Film and video adaptations
Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
description: Episode of Series "The Chronicles of Narnia". In the enchanted land of Narnia old King Caspian's only son and heir, Prince Rillian has disappeared. The great lion, Aslan, calls on Jill and Eustace, guiding them in their search for the lost prince. On their perilous quest, the children meet up with Puddleglum who travels with them to the land of giants. Their search leads them to face the Green Witch, the Queen of the Deep Realm whose spell they must break. Based on the Narnia Chronicles of C. S. Lewis.
